#summary How to install and run SubDownloader on GNU/Linux


=Requisites=

    * python 2.5
    * python-wxgtk2.8 [http://www.wxpython.org/download.php#binaries (.deb)] 
    * imdbpy
    * mmpython 

=Method 1: Download last sources=

Download and uncompress the last 1.2.9 sources from [http://subdownloader.googlecode.com/files/sources.1.2.9.zip here]

    Run #python Subdownloader.py

=Method 2: .deb package for DEBIAN,UBUNTU,ETC=

(as root) Add this line to your /etc/apt/sources.list

    deb http://www.vinalinux.com/projects/subdownloader/repository/ ./

then run:

    # apt-get update
    # apt-get install subdownloader
